RecordAggregationDefinition.name: RecordAggregationDefinition
RecordAggregationDefinition.description: Represents a data aggregation from one object to another object to which it is connected by other objects in the data model.

AggregateFromObject.description: Required. API name of the object from which data is aggregated.

AggregateToObject.description: Required. API name of the object to which data is aggregated.

AggregationType.description: Required. Type of the data aggregation.

BatchProcessingDefinitionId.description: Data Processing Engine definition that aggregates data from one record to another.

Description.description: The description for this record aggregation definition.

DeveloperName.description: Unqiue name for the RecordAggregationDefinition object.

DisplayName.description: Required. The name of the record aggregation definition that's displayed in the record page.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated RecordAggregationDefinition type in Metadata API.

Language.description: The language of the record aggregation definition.

MasterLabel.description: Label for the record aggregation definition.

Status.description: The status of the record aggregation definition.
